text: Christopher Lawrence "Bong" Tesoro Go (; born June 14, 1974) is a Filipino politician. He is a Senator since 2019. He was Special Assistant to the President and Head of the Presidential Management Staff from June 2016 to October 2018 during the Rodrigo Duterte cabinet. In October 2021, Go announced his candidacy for Vice President of the Philippines in the 2022 election. However the following month, he withdrew from the vice presidential election to run for President of the Philippines. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Filipino basketball players Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Politicians from Davao del Sur
title: Bong Go
